title: Organigram of the University of Technology Nuremberg | UTN

text_sections.section_2: The UTN is currently governed by two central bodies: the Founding Executive Board and the Founding Steering Board, as laid down in the Gesetz zur Errichtung der Technischen Universität Nürnberg. The Founding Executive Board is responsible for developing and conducting a sustainable overall strategy for the university and is supported by the Founding Steering Board. This lean governance structure constitutes a prime foundation for establishing the UTN by means of swift decision-making and efficient consultation processes.
text_sections.section_5: The Office for Internal Auditing (INT-AUD) (https://www.utn.de/en/organisation/administration/#internal-auditing) also reports to the Kanzler. It is responsible for ensuring integrity, efficiency and transparency in all university processes. The office ensures the highest compliance standards through continuous monitoring and thorough audits.

meta_tags.description: The structure of UTN is aligned with the basic principles of interdisciplinarity, internationality and digitality.
